about_the_game:
Darkness is chasing you -- literally. In The Rogue of Nexus you won't just have to fight monsters, but escape from a colossal and ever-present Hand determined to drag you into the abyss.

Inspired by the frenetic pace of Half-Minute Hero and the addictive replayability of The Binding of Isaac, The Rogue of Nexus throws you into procedurally generated dungeons filled with loot, traps and hordes of bizarre creatures. Every step counts. Can you overcome destiny and escape the Hand's grasp?

Relentless pursuit

The Hand is always lurking. Its presence dynamically alters the environment, forcing you to adapt and keep moving. There is no hiding: only survival.

Survive the dungeons

Every path is unique! Explore countless dungeons filled with enemies, hidden treasures and deadly traps.

Artifacts of Power

Discover a wide range of powerful artifacts that drastically alter your chances of survival. Find them all and become an unstoppable force (as long as you can overcome the Hand).

Reach the end of the world

Immerse yourself in a vibrant and fascinating pixel art world with a dark and bizarre twist.

In The Rogue of Nexus, time is the most precious resource. Each dungeon is a frantic race against time, with the looming threat of the Hand constantly pushing you forward. Collect powerful artifacts to improve your skills. Each run is a new challenge, and each failure will give you the boost to get back up even stronger.

name: The Rogue of Nexus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent, AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 3600+ (2 * 1910) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7300 GT (512 MB), Radeon X1300 Pro (256 MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent, AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+ (2 * 2600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8600 GT (512 MB), Radeon HD 4650 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 640 MB available space

short_description: Face evil in this Roguelite Action RPG and find your way home. Darkness is engulfing the world, escape from the hand and don't get caught.
